schemaDescription: gender: string: Gender of the customer, one of "Male" or "Female
ever_married: string: If the customer has ever been married, one of "Yes" or "No"
age: integer: Age of the customer at the time of segmentation, numeric value
graduated: string: If the customer has graduated, one of "Yes" or "No"
metadata.actionSignature: predict/args: 'datasource: CustomerClassificationModelDataSource, gender: str, ever_married: str, age: int, graduated: str'
